DOC.brief_summary: The investigators have developed a simple to use device that facilitates the monitoring of the upper eyelids motion, acquires the eyelid vertical movement and enables analysis and graphic presentation of the results. the device system consists 3 components : glasses for the patient including magneto sensitive probes, hardware and dedicated software. Our purpose is to characterize eyelid motion in normal population. The methods include measuring each patient 10 minutes during watching a short movie.
DOC.brief_title: Eyelid Movement Sensor Device- Blinking Characterizing
DOC.detailed_description: Essentially, for Hall-probes monitor the magnetic field generated by a tiny magnets attached to the upper eyelid.
DOC.criteria: healthy 1867 year olds with no eye medical history pregnancy head trauma history using contact lens
